title: SUTTER @LYON NICE UNITS PRICED TO RENT+EXCELLENT PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION
posting_body: ['SUTTER NEAR PRESIDIO NICE UNITS + EXCELLENT PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION + EXCELLENT CENTRAL LOCATION + WELL PRICED', 'ADDRESS', ': 2714-A SUTTER ST.', '(Between Lyon St. and Presidio Ave.)', 'RENT', ':  $ 2,600.00.', 'NO EMAILS OR TEXTUAL We will not respond - Direct Communications only.', 'AVAILABLE', ':  May 22, 2022.', 'DESCRIPTION', ':', '•• GOOD SIZE, 2 BEDROOM, 1 BATH (tub and shower over).', '4 + ROOMS, INCLUDING LIVING ROOM AND LARGE EAT-IN KITCHEN (with gas stove, and refrigerator).', '•• SMALL BONUS ROOM OFF KITCHEN (Office, den, study, etc. Not a bedroom)', '•• HARDWOOD AND CARPET FLOORS.', 'COMPLETELY REPAINTED,  SHOWS VERY WELL.', 'BASEBOARD HEAT.', '** REMODELED LARGE EAT-IN KITCHEN WITH NEW REFRIGERATOR', '** UPDATED BATHROOM WITH NEW TILE FLOOR AND LARGE OLD-STYLE SOAKING TUB (with shower over).', '•• SHARED YARD WITH TABLES & CHAIRS FOR B-B-Q, ETC.', ' PATIO.', 'SMALL DECK OFF APARTMENT.', '•• THIS APARTMENT IS LOCATED ON THE SECOND FLOOR IN A 6 UNIT BUILDING.', '•• SECURITY GATE.', 'UPDATED SYSTEMS.', '•• STYLE IS A "RAILROAD PLAN," WITH UNIT RUNNING FROM FRONT TO BACK OF BUILDING.', '•• ATTRACTIVE OLDER STYLE, WELL-MAINTAINED, WALK-UP BUILDING.', 'WINDOW COVERINGS.', 'CABLE READY.', '•• ON-STREET PARKING ONLY (No Garage).', 'AMENITIES:', '•• SHARED YARD WITH TABLES and CHAIRS FOR B-B-Q, ETC.', ' PATIO.', 'SMALL DECK OFF APARTMENT.', '••', 'SEPARATE BICYCLE ROOM', 'IN THE BUILDING TO STORE BIKES (no motorcycles or related motor-powered devices).', '•• FULL RECYCLING PROVIDED FOR PAPER, BOTTLES, CANS, PLASTICS (Blue Bin) and FOOD AND YARD SCRAPS - COMPOSTABLES (Green Bin).', '•• EXTENSIVE SEISMIC REINFORCEMENT IN EXCESS OF REQUIRED CITY OF SAN FRANCISCO AND STATE EARTHQUAKE STANDARDS.', '••     ON PREMISES SEPARATE LAUNDRY ROOM.', 'DISTRICT/LOCATION', ':', '•• HIGHLY DESIRABLE LOWER PACIFIC HEIGHTS - BETWEEN PRESIDIO AND LYON STREETS, ON THE SUNNY SIDE OF THE STREET (North side)', '••', 'EXCELLENT PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION', '-  CAR BARN (public transportation hub) IS A BLOCK AWAY; SUTTER, GEARY AND CALIFORNIA  BUSES RUN DIRECT TO DOWNTOWN and THROUGHOUT THE CITY.', '•• WALKING DISTANCE', 'TO LAUREL VILLAGE SHOPPING DISTRICT:', "with 2 fine gourmet markets plus Trader Joe's is walking distance, Peets and Starbucks, Noah's Bagels, Books Inc., 4 Banks (Bank of America, Chase, Wells Fargo, and First Republic Bankcorp) Charles Schwab office, Walgreen's, Fine Liquor and Wine store (Wine Impressions), Vixi Cucina Italiana, Garibaldi's, Ella's (great Bruches); Ace Hardware & Hardware Unlimited, cooking store, Chico’s clothes store, and others.", 'Also a short walk away is Trader Joe’s and Target', 'THE NEARBY SACRAMENTO STREET COMMERCIAL STRIP OFFERS  excellent restaurants, numerous antique & gift stores, Sue Fisher King housewares, Good Byes (fine consignment clothes) & other upscale Clothes boutiques (Blu, The Grocery Store, Blanc, Button Down for men and women), 2 cleaners (incl.', 'Peninou), cobbler, Hardware Unlimited, the Vogue movie theater, etc.)', 'DIVISADERO ST.', 'SHOPPING AREA, UC-MT.', 'ZION, KAISER MEDICAL CENTER, AND USF ARE ALL CLOSE-BY.', 'GORILLA GYM AND FITNESS CENTER IS 2 BLOCKS AWAY, AND THE WONDERFUL NEW JEWISH COMMUNITY CENTER, WITH COMPLETE FITNESS CENTER, IS ONLY 3 BLOCKS AWAY.', 'CALIFORNIA PACIFIC MEDICAL CENTER, CHILDREN’S HOSPITAL', 'CAMPUS IS WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE.', 'Also numerous Medical - Dental providers & Labs at 3838 California St.', 'TERMS', ':', "SECURITY DEPOSIT IS $4,000.00  PLUS 1ST MONTH'S RENT  = approx.", '$6,750.00 TOTAL MOVE-IN AMOUNT.', '1 YEAR LEASE (no exceptions).', 'NO PETS.', 'NO SMOKING BUILDING.', 'Smoking not permitted in apartments nor in any public areas of the building.', 'TENANT PAYS FOR THEIR UTILITIES.', 'PLUS a pro-rated share (1/6th) of the overall building utilities & cleaning.', ' These will be re-billed to the tenant approximately every 3 - 7 months.', 'APPLICATION:', 'After viewing', "the premises, if you have decided you are interested in renting, an application will be provided, and a minimum deposit consisting of the first month's rent will be due at that time.", 'We do not provide applications unless you are serious and ready to rent the apartment (i.e. submit a deposit).', 'AN APPLICATION CAN ALSO BE PRINTED OUT AT <URL>', 'FOR RENTAL APPLICATION AFTER VIEWING THE APARTMENT CALL', ':', 'show contact info', '.', 'PLEASE LEAVE A BRIEF MESSAGE WITH YOUR DAY AND EVENING PHONE NUMBER (and speak CLEARLY, don’t mumble or the call will not be returned).', 'PHONE CALLS ONLY, NO EMAIL OR TEXTING.']
